column4: I'm upgrading to 9.04 via a fresh install with /home on a separate partition - will it automatically import my old user account if I give it the same name and password in the install phase?
yeah, it's going to be mounted as /home and not formatted
I don't even think it asks for the password, it just offers to migrate the previous info if it sees it
but if you've got a separate home partition, you're not migrating anything, you don't need themigration asistant
